nodes.text: The antidote for the Bordal Contagion disease was created on the planet Tauber by Republic scientists. Kett Shipping, as well as other companies, sent convoys to collect and deliver the antidote to the infected Bordali, but the Fujari pirates intercepted and ruined six million doses of it. Eventually, however, the Rseikharhl set up their own labs to manufacture the antidote, but the delay cost millions of lives on Bordal.
